name: Multi-Field List-Map Flattener Processor
description: Takes a list of maps and flattens it by reading out a number of specific keys of that map. The resulting lists will be appended to the datapacket.

parameters.name: list_field
parameters.description: The name of the field that contains the list of maps.

parameters.name: map_fields
parameters.description: The name of the fields that need to be extracted from the separate maps.

parameters.name: ignore_empty
parameters.description: If set to true, will only continue with non-empty values
